pages.title: Powders
pages.text: Powders can be get in Herbalist Table by placing an object in the input slot and clicking the Pound button.There are many types of powders currently: all magical crystals can be powdered, amber, oak bark, shinyphere seedbox, sheep's stomach, wither fork bone, reindeer moss, dried potentilla and ledum herba, dried russian or african wormwood herba.
